title: Lady Gaga celebrates 10 years of naked ice baths with very revealing snaps
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Lady Gaga has marked the 10th anniversary of her hit single Bad Romance with a naked ice bath post.

The popstar, 33, looks freezing as she sits in an ice cold bath with her fingers formed into a claw-like shape.

In a second image, she covers her naked body with her hands crossed over her chest, and hides her eyes with a pair of dark sunglasses.

"Happy 10 year Anniversary Bad Romance. Same woman, different bath," Gaga captioned.

Fans commented on the black and white snaps, adding that she's the "queen of baths".

But pop icon Gaga has always been a fan of making bold moves, and has a history of wearing strange outfits to public events.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

In 2010, she had all eyes on her as she once rocked up to the MTV VMAs wearing a dress that was made entirely out of raw meat .

She hacked off fellow celeb guests and animal rights groups with the outrageous outfit.

(Image: Getty)

(Image: Reuters)

Eminem felt me might gag when he found he was seated next to Gaga.

A source close to the rap superstar told Mirror Online: "Marshall said he didn't want to be sat next to a pile of raw meat all night. He said it smelled pretty bad."

(Image: Jackson Lee / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Jackson Lee / SplashNews.com)

Earlier this year, Gaga sported a bizarre munchkin dress to the pre-Met Gala party .

The black and white-striped frock featured no shortage of ruching, swamping her petite 5ft 1in frame.

She teamed the edgy gown with an impractical miniature handbag which she carried on one manicured finger, and an equally impractical pair of towering black platform boots.

(Image: Getty)

And in 2011, she literally hatched out of an egg when she arrived at the Grammy Awards.

Wearing a yolk-coloured Latex bra, skirt and revealing a bare stomach, Gaga completed the look with black lipstick and a long, pink side-ponytail.
description: She released her inner ice queen to celebrate the anniversary of her hit single Bad Romance
